alert.note: Alert for Fond du Lac; Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 5:29PM CDT until September 25 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ozaukee County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southeastern Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Washington County in southeastern Wisconsin... Sheboygan County in east central Wisconsin... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 529 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Camp Rokilio Scout Camp to 8 miles northwest of Random Lake to near Theresa, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sheboygan, West Bend, Mequon, Brown Deer, Grafton, Cedarburg, Port Washington, Plymouth, Sheboygan Falls, Jackson, Slinger, Saukville, Bayside, Kewaskum, Thiensville, Howards Grove, Germantown, Oostburg, Belgium and Fredonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Fond du Lac; Ozaukee; Sheboygan; Washington
